data.Sentence_cn: 荒岛生活
data.Sentence: --- lesson 12  Life on a desert island

data.Sentence_cn: 我们许多人对于荒岛生活有一种不切实际的想法。
data.Sentence: Most of us have formed an unrealistic picture of life on a desert island.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们有时想象荒岛是阳光终日普照的天堂。
data.Sentence: We sometimes imagine a desert island to be a sort of paradise where the sun always shines.

data.Sentence_cn: 在那里，生活简单又美好。
data.Sentence: Life there is simple and good.

data.Sentence_cn: 成熟的水果从树上掉下来，人们根本无需劳动。
data.Sentence: Ripe fruit falls from the trees and you never have to work.

data.Sentence_cn: 另一种想法恰恰相反，
data.Sentence: The other side of the picture is quite the opposite.

data.Sentence_cn: 认为荒岛生活很可怕，
data.Sentence: Life on a desert island is wretched.

data.Sentence_cn: 要么饿死，要么像鲁滨孙那样，天天盼船来，却总不见船影。
data.Sentence: You either starve to death or live like Robinson Crusoe, waiting for a boat which never comes.

data.Sentence_cn: 也许，这两种想象都有可信之处。
data.Sentence: Perhaps there is an element of truth in both these pictures,

data.Sentence_cn: 但很少有人能有机会去弄个究竟。
data.Sentence: but few of us have had the opportunity to find out.

data.Sentence_cn: 最近有两个人在一座珊瑚岛上呆了5天，他们真希望在那儿再多呆一些日子。
data.Sentence: Two men who recently spent five days on a coral island wished they had stayed there longer.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们驾着一条严重损坏的小船从维尔京群岛去迈阿密修理。
data.Sentence: They were taking a badly damaged boat from the Virgin Islands to Miami to have it repaired.

data.Sentence_cn: 途中，船开始下沉，
data.Sentence: During the journey, their boat began to sink.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们迅速把食物、火柴、罐装啤酒往一只救生筏上装。
data.Sentence: They quickly loaded a small rubber dinghy with food, matches, and cans of beer

data.Sentence_cn: 然后在加勒比海上划行了几英里，到了一座珊瑚岛上。
data.Sentence: and rowed for a few miles across the Caribbean until they arrived at a tiny coral island.

data.Sentence_cn: 岛上几乎没有一颗树，也没有淡水，但这不算什么问题。
data.Sentence: There were hardly any trees on the island and there was no water, but this did not prove to be a problem.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们用像皮艇蓄积雨水。
data.Sentence: The men collected rainwater in the rubber dinghy.

data.Sentence_cn: 由于他们随身带了一支捕鱼枪，因此，吃饭不愁。
data.Sentence: As they had brought a spear gun with them, they had plenty to eat.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们天天捕捉龙虾和鱼，正如其中一位所说，吃得“像国王一样好”。
data.Sentence: They caught lobster and fish every day，and, as one of them put it 'ate like kings'.

data.Sentence_cn: 5天后，一条油轮从那儿路过，搭救了他们。这二位不得不离开那个荒岛时，还真的感到遗憾呢！
data.Sentence: When a passing tanker rescued them five days later, both men were genuinely sorry that they had to leave.
